conversations.body_text: Hi Le Huan,     We apologize for the delay in shipping your order. Your shipment requires customs clearance information to proceed. Please provide your details.

Hey there,

You can use the info below:
ID card
Number: 075093000152

Please keep me updates if anything changes.

*_____________________________________*
*HUAN LE*

Phone:  +84 (981) 033067
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/huanle2312/
Email: huanle2312@gmail.com
Hi Le Huan,    We apologize for the delay. Your package has been shipped.  https://www.sf-international.com/gb/en/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF5127154688505

Hi there, there is a hiccup at the declaration and the shipping /custom
declaring is being unreasonable. Could  you support me and i will begin to
return it back to your warehouse and then you can ship to me at an adress
in China (i will take care of the oversea shipping from there).

Please get back to me as soon as possible on this matter.

Thank you so much.

*_____________________________________*
*HUAN LE*

Phone:  +84 (981) 033067
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/huanle2312/
Email: huanle2312@gmail.com
Hi Le Huan,    Sorry, but the package may not be returnable.

Hi there,

Now they are saying that because you guys declared 910 cny for shipping
fee, i must pay the tax based on the value of item (on your website) and
your 910 cny shipping fee. Overall, i have to pay more than double the tax
that i have to pay. It is around $150 dollar to do so, more than half of
the value for the pedal.

I dont think that it is fair for me to do that because of what you guys
have declared and the work you have done with the shipping carrier company.
Please find a way to resolve this without the neccessity of returning.

Sincerely,

*_____________________________________*
*HUAN LE*

Phone:  +84 (981) 033067
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/huanle2312/
Email: huanle2312@gmail.com





On Mon, 12 Jan 2026 at 19:15 service@simsonn.com
Hi Le Huan,    We declared the price as $57, and we will not declare the shipping fee.

Hi there,

I have received this from the shipping company to declare my duty, it
stated that rhe price is 57 but the freight charge is 910. It may be the SF
China side that messed this up.

Either way, now o have to play $150 to receive that on top of the
processing fee from SF Viet Nam which is $20.

Please rake a look at the document

*_____________________________________*
*HUAN LE*

Phone:  +84 (981) 033067
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/huanle2312/
Email: huanle2312@gmail.com





On Tue, 13 Jan 2026 at 18:54 service@simsonn.com
Hi Le Huan,    We have already contacted the logistics provider to resolve the issue. Please do not worry.
